[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#e02b20″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Data Infringement Or Breach” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_color=”#0098eb” background_image=”https://thecyberforensics.com/wptcfadmn/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/04-cyber-forensics-image.jpg” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” title_letter_spacing=”1px” title_font_size=”48px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″ title_font_size_tablet=”42px” title_font_size_phone=”34px” custom_padding=”10%||10%||true|false”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″]

If you face any corporate or personal data breach, we come up with the necessary tools to quickly safeguard your company’s data and reputation. Together with make every fundamental step to legally secure yourself, your family, business and customers. 

We secure your important data no matter where it resides, on-premise or in the cloud and gives you a practical vision on user hazardous action that endangered your important data. 

Our expert team quickly find clear evidence against attacks or threats in the audit logs. The processes come under data breaching are :

Analyze data risk: Find the unusual activity and speedy investigation on data threats. In addition, employ proactive measures to reduce data theft risk. 

Examination and safeguard of data: You as an owner can only access your confidential data without knowing others. Our experts audit all data activity and take immediate action to reduce the damage. 

Data disclosure and categorization: Be aware of the delicate data you have and where it resides. There are few chances of data damage by finding new, wretch and overlooked databases. After that, classify data stores in scope for consistency.  

Data susceptibility analysis: We find the security space which an attacker takes advantage of. The team can scan data for exposure and failure. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
